ing: 1/4 cup QuakerÂ® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
n: Peanut Butter Banana Berry Oat Smoothie
des: "Oats, fruit, peanut butter, milk, and honey are blended together for a quick smoothie on a busy morning."
ins:
Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
Garnish with additional sliced bananas and oats, if preferred.
